nodes.text: Uta T'Cha's workshop was located next to the droid gladiatorial arena in the town of Ghaz Kul IV on the planet Pitann. Uta T'Cha used the workshop as her base of operations when developing a remote control system to take control of any droid for Senator Sho'ban Do. She also used the workshop to modify droids for the droid gladiatorial contests.
